title: Record shape and type in autograd to validate gradients
body_html:
In the autograd engine, we now validate:

  • The gradient's shape matches the expected shape
  • The gradient's type is compatible with the expected type (i.e. exactly the same or a sparse version of the expected type)

We can also check that gradients are defined when we expect them to be. This check is currently commented out because it triggers in TestJit.test_ge_optimized.

We can also check that gradients are defined when we expect them to be. This check is currently commented out because it triggers in TestJit.test_ge_optimized.
